import Navbar from "./Navbar"; import Footer from './Footer'; import Gas from './img/gas.webp'; import Img23 from './img/image23.webp'; import Img24 from './img/image24.webp'; import Img25 from './img/image25.webp'; import Img26 from './img/image26.webp'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Gastroenterology() { return(

Gastroenterology

{/*

Diagnosis and Treatment of Gastroenterological Disorders

*/}

The Gastroenterology department of Maurya Group of Hospital is the branch of medicine focused on the digestive system and its disorders. The team is well trained to diagnose and treat problems in your gastrointestinal (GI) tract and liver. These doctors also do routine procedures such as colonoscopies, which look at the inside of your colon.

{/* */}

Explore our gastroenterology care features

Gastroenterological Disorders

Clinical Team

Treatment

Testimonials

) }
